description:
Conan, Agasa, and the kids visit a boarding house where they are greeted by Ryoko, Aya, and Juri, the three sisters who manage the building. Conan happens upon Aya and Juri`s boyfriend Masahiko arguing. Aya is strongly opposed to Juri`s relationship with Masahiko, who is known for being a bad boy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cherche fiancé dans tempête de neige
The Lover Gone Missing in a Snowstorm
